about_the_game:
Collectors Upgrade Pack contains:
​

Outfit Pack

​
2 special outfits: Cinnabar and Emerald
*No special effects

Weapon Pack

3 special weapons with particle effects: Light Sword Module: Harden, Greatsword Module: Rock, Twin Blades: Flash
*Unlock the weapons in-game to use

Item Pack

​
2 Weapon Enhance Chips: Offensive HF Chip and Analytical Chip
*Unlock Chip system to use

Digital Artbook

​
Digital Artbook of the game

Digital Soundtrack (Selected)

ANNO: Mutationem OST contains the selected in-game soundtrack, Includes 21 music tracks, can only be played in-game
